itunes:author: iBooks
title: Brad Meltzer, Michael Koryta, & David Baldacci: Meet the Authors
itunes:subtitle: The three mega-selling authors discuss their books and their careers.
itunes:summary: An introduction to three authors who are at the height of their careers. Brad Meltzer, bestselling author of The Book of Fate, talks about his thriller, The Inner Circle. Michael Koryta discusses his supernatural thriller, So Cold the River. David Baldacci's tremendously successful first novel, Absolute Power, was adapted into a film and turned him into a household name.
itunes:keywords: Brad Meltzer, Michael Koryta, David Baldacci, meet the author, apple store, apple store events, authors, books
